name: Stan Pines
info:
• 简体中文名: 斯坦·派恩斯
  • 别名: Stanford "Stan" Pines
  • 别名: Grunkle Stan
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: http://gravityfalls.wikia.com/wiki/Stan_Pines
detail: Stanford "Stan" Pines, also known as Grunkle Stan, is Mabel and Dipper's sly, greedy, miserly great uncle and summer guardian. He loves to make profit, most commonly using scandals involving the "supernatural" to attract tourists to his Mystery Shack, which many fall prey to. Despite his antics, he professes a skepticism for Gravity Falls' supernatural side, though this is later revealed to be a facade to cover his own secrets about the town.
